ygData.subject: Re: Spell Resisted
ygData.msgSnippet: wow, that s pretty low :)  lemme tell u one thing tho, the other members of the party, at higher lvls, WILL be able to tell if ur spells r resisted or not.
ygData.messageBody:
wow, that's pretty low :) lemme tell u one thing tho, the other members of
the party, at higher lvls, WILL be able to tell if ur spells r resisted or
not. why? because without our big dmg spells, the fights usually last much
longer. and also, many fights hinge on EVERYBODY doing their job. when i'm
in a group, everybody is counting on me to take the mob from 1/4 health to
no health. plain and simple, its my job to finish him. they dont even
expect me to start casting until the mob is at least half dead, although
they r starting to get greedy with my stun spell :) if somebody doesnt do
their part, it could result in multiple deaths. the best thing for u to do
is to let the party know that the mobs they r pulling r out of ur casting
range, and that they need to pull lower lvl mobs if possible. u can also try
different variations of spells (fire, ice, magic) just in case the mob has a
particularly high resist to any one of the types. it has worked on
occassion for me to switch between flame shock, force shock, and frost
shock.

also, i dont know what lvl u r, but i damn sure dont have room in my VERY
LIMITED 8 spell slots to put a lvl 1 dd spell :)

Sinlaru Ce`alen
Rallos Zek


-----Original Message-----
From: yur@... <yur@...>
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Friday, June 25, 1999 11:01 AM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Spell Resisted


>From: yur@...
>
>
>
>
>I don't know about you, but i have NEVER been kicked out of a group for
being
>resisted. mainly because i don't tell them i'm resisted :). Just cast
ur lvl
>1 shock and since its only 6 dmg. the mob will NEVER (at least never for
me)
>come after you. and your group can't tell the difference in the color of
the
>spells since all of them look the same. they think ur casing some high lvl
shock
>heehhe.
>
>Works fine for me so far, i sit there, no danger, no mana loss, and i get
XP and
>follow their loot order just fine. I made 50 plat and gained 2 lvl in 3
days
>and died only once. From the skeleton monk i mention in previous post.
When
>group leader ask for mana status, just say what others say. (ie. if cleric
says
>20% mana, u say 15%) that way they don't think ur doing nothing hehe.
>
>its good trick and works well to keep our mind off how they block up at 6
lvl.
>Since verant make us team up, i don't see much else we can do about it
except to
>abuse the fact that others cannot see what we cast and what our mana is at
:) [
>maybe this is why they don't let others see?]
>
>
>
>
>re:
>
>According to yur@...:
>> I've been in Unrest since lvl 15 and most of my spells are resisted by
Dark
>> Bones and Dry Bones. But its not so bad as long as your groups are doing
>fine.
>> Just join up and sit there to gain Xp and Loot. no danger since u don't
hit
>the
>> mob, so it won't come after u. Just cast it once at start of fight to
see if
>> its resisted. and then start on the Radiation. I gained a lot Xp and
only
>died
>> Once from a skeleton monk that killed someone else and then came after me
from
>> behind. if they ask you why you aren't helping, just say ur resisted.
or
>just
>> cast a few frost shocks to pretend ur helping out :)
>
>Then, in the middle of Unrest, you suddendly are ejected from the group.
Ok,
>time to Gate :(
